data.pageDescription: Explore the projects, workshops, and tutorials that Graziano Casto has created. Discover his work in platform engineering, cloud native technologies, and developer experience.

projects.title: KALCO
projects.description: Extract, validate, analyze & version control your entire Kubernetes cluster. Zero-config backup, comprehensive reporting & Git integration.

projects.title: Jarvis ADK Voice Agent
projects.description: A Google ADK voice agent implementation using Gemini 2.5 Flash with Google Search, Filesystem access and PDF reading capabilities.

projects.title: Deploying GenAI Models on Kubernetes
projects.description: Tutorial for deploying LLMs on local Kubernetes (Minikube on Apple Silicon w/ GPU) following MLOps (GitOps) best practices with Helm, ArgoCD, and Istio.

projects.title: Ephemeral Environments with Crossplane and kube-green
projects.description: A collection of tutorials to create ephemeral environments with crossplane e kube-green.

schema.name: Projects - Graziano Casto
schema.description: Explore projects and tutorials by Graziano Casto
